name: Women's Hoka Clifton 9
description: The women's Hoka Clifton 9 has the cushion and comfort you crave for long runs, long walks and long hours spent on your feet—all in a sleek and lightweight package.

name: Men's Hoka Clifton 9
description: The men's Hoka Clifton 9 has the cushion and comfort you crave for long runs, long walks and long hours spent on your feet—all in a sleek and lightweight package.

name: Asics Superblast 2
description: The Asics Superblast 2 transforms your run from feeling ordinary to super.

name: Women's Saucony Endorphin Speed 4
description: Bring the everyday speed with the Saucony Endorphin Speed 4.

name: Men's Saucony Endorphin Speed 4
description: Bring the everyday speed with the Saucony Endorphin Speed 4.

name: Men's Vuori Strato Tech Tee
description: This men’s short sleeve shirt is the most comfortable, softest workout shirt on the planet. It uses Vuori’s buttery smooth performance knit that wicks away moisture, has anti-odor properties and UPF 30+ rating for next level comfort.

name: Women's Rabbit EZ Tee - Long Sleeve
description: So easy to love it may be hard to take off, the EZ Tee offers everything you could want in a running shirt. Made with our impossibly soft Quick N’ Fit fabric, the EZ Tee is so comfortable you may forget you’re wearing it.

name: Men's Brooks Sherpa 5" 2-in-1 Shorts
description: The Brooks Sherpa 5" 2-in-1 Shorts takes comfort and performance to the next level. Brooks updated its Sherpa short with a new, flat waistband that stays put. It won’t ride up or slide down, and it sits slightly higher on your waist for more coverage.

name: Women's Rabbit 4" Speed Leggy
description: These mid-length boy shorts give you more coverage and an even better feel with moderate compression. Details such as a mid-rise waist, no liner and 4” inseam will have you sprinting to the finish.
